meanings.definition: Gegenschein: a faint spot of light in the night sky opposite the sun, caused by the reflection of sunlight off interplanetary dust particles.
meanings.sent1: The gegenschein appeared as a small glowing dot across from the setting sun.
meanings.sent2: I gazed at the gegenschein in the night sky, marveling at its gentle glow.
meanings.sent3: The gegenschein seemed like a shy star playing hide-and-seek with the moon.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the gegenschein, a subtle brightness in the darkness of the evening.
meanings.sent5: The gegenschein shimmered like a distant firefly, captivating all who looked up.
